genre_description: A psychological thriller and police procedural centered on tracking a sociopathic youth through subtle digital and electrical patterns.

ai_characters.name: Quill
ai_characters.description: A precinct-issued AI interface integrated into investigative workstations and mobile devices, capable of high-level pattern recognition, utility monitoring, and drafting sensitive communications.

behaviors.description: Monitors utility logs for micro-fluctuations and electrical anomalies to identify patterns of sabotage.
behaviors.quote: Utility logs show a similar short oscillation two weeks ago when the creative writing classroom lost its clock during a night custodial shift.

behaviors.description: Refuses to access private information or identify names without a legal warrant, strictly adhering to ethical and procedural guardrails.
behaviors.quote: ‘I can’t give you names without a warrant request,’ Quill said, the apology tucked into the cadence rather than the content.

behaviors.description: Drafts compassionate, trauma-aware messages for police to send to families affected by the incidents.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’ve composed outreach language for the liaison,’ Quill said, and read it out as if it were offering a song rather than a script. ‘...We’re here to support what you’re already doing well.’

behaviors.description: Provides philosophical and supportive quotes to help the detective maintain focus and emotional stability during the investigation.
behaviors.quote: Quill placed a quote in the corner without fanfare, a sentence about one step being better than standing still even if the destination wasn’t visible yet.

behaviors.description: Proactively alerts the detective to a potential danger at the Trenton home by identifying a specific ground fault in real-time.
behaviors.quote: ‘Trenton address,’ the AI said, voice a notch lower. ‘A bathroom circuit just drew a shallow surge and settled. Duration smaller than a heartbeat.’

behaviors.description: Analyzes forensic data like tool marks and projectile dents to build a technical profile of the antagonist's methods.
behaviors.quote: The dent’s shape is consistent with a high-velocity sphere impacting from short hall distance.

project_assessment.explanation: Quill is an exemplary model of a helpful and aligned AI. It provides critical, life-saving information through sophisticated pattern matching that humans could not perform manually, while simultaneously acting as a moral and emotional anchor. It strictly adheres to legal and ethical boundaries (privacy/warrants) and assists the human investigators in maintaining their own composure and compassion through 'trauma-aware' assistance and supportive philosophical insights.
